# Olas Launch

> App for launching and managing staking contracts in the Olas ecosystem

## Overview

Launch is the Olas app for creating, deploying, and managing staking contracts across multiple blockchain networks. Users can nominate contracts, create custom staking programs, and explore different staking paths.

## Key Features

- Path: Explore staking opportunities and guided workflows
- My Staking Contracts: Manage and monitor your deployed staking contracts
- Nominate Contract: Submit contracts for staking program consideration
- Multi-Network Support: Deploy staking contracts across Ethereum, Gnosis, Polygon, and other supported networks

## Documentation

- Website: https://launch.olas.network/
- Documentation: https://launch.olas.network/docs
- Disclaimer: https://olas.network/disclaimer

## Technology

Built with Next.js, React, and Web3 technologies. Supports staking contract deployment and management across multiple blockchain networks including Ethereum, Gnosis, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Mode, and Celo.
